Name: Hymn of the Far Sea
Description:
"Waves strike the reef like trembling strings.
Their sound rises from the surge, chasing the wind into the boundless sky.
Each chord is a secret the deep sea has yet to speak.
Stars and waterlight resonate, weaving a melody that surrounds the battlefield.
And those who listen shall find their way home within the hymn."
(Excerpt from "Book of the Depths VI")
Description2: When equipped, the weapon's appearance will be replaced with: Hymn of the Far Sea.
